<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H6035|עָנָו]]</big>**</small>
 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָה‎</span>] **verb** ==be occupied, busied with== (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>), only Ecclesiastes (perhaps Aramaic loan-word; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be occupied with***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***occupation, affair***; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***concern one***, also ***be occupied*** by; [[Eccl.42.8|Eccl 42:8]] margin); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲנוֺתִ‎</span> [[Eccl.1.13|Eccl 1:13]]; [[Eccl.3.10|Eccl 3:10]]. 



 III. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָה‎</span>] **verb** ==be bowed down, afflicted== ( Late Hebrew ***id.***; [[BDB#MI|MI]] Pi\`el <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ויענו‎</span> [[Ps.1.5|Ps 1:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אענו‎</span> [[Ps.1.6|Ps 1:6]] Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***enû***</u></abbr> ***thwart, frustrate, do violence to***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be lowly subsmissive***, see Rahlfs<sup><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנִי‎</span> und <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנָי‎</span> in d. Psalmen (1892), 67 ff.</sup>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַנִּי‎</span> Pa\`el ***oppress***; Syriac Ethpe\`el ***humble oneself***, and derivatives); — Qal ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָנִיתִי‎</span> [[Ps.116.10|Ps 116:10]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַעֲנֶה‎</span> [[Isa.25.5|Isa 25:5]]; [[Isa.31.4|Isa 31:4]], etc.; — 

**1.** ***be put down or become low***, of song of triumph [[Isa.25.5|Isa 25:5]] (others as **Hiph\`il** ***he putteth down***, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּכְנִיעַ‎</span>). 

**2.** ***be depressed, downcast*** [[Isa.31.4|Isa 31:4]] (of lion; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵחָ֑ת‎</span>). 

**3.** ***be afficted*** [[Ps.116.10|Ps 116:10]]; [[Ps.119.67|Ps 119:67]]; [[Zech.10.2|Zech 10:2]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲניתִי‎</span> [[Ps.119.107|Ps 119:107]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵעָנֹת‎</span> (perhaps read as Qal [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:51»§ 51</sup> ***l***) [[Exod.10.3|Exod 10:3]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲנֶה‎</span> [[Isa.53.7|Isa 53:7]] feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲנָה‎</span> [[Isa.58.10|Isa 58:10]] — 

**1.** ***humble oneself*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּנֵי‎</span> [[Exod.10.3|Exod 10:3]]. 

**2.** ***be afficted [[Ps.119.107|Ps 119:107]]; [[Isa.53.7|Isa 53:7]]; [[Isa.58.10|Isa 58:10]].*** **Piel.** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִנָּה‎</span> [[Deut.22.24|Deut 22:24]] + 5 t.; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִנִּיתָ‎</span> [[Ps.88.8|Ps 88:8]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִנֵּיתִי‎</span> [[Ps.35.13|Ps 35:13]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעִנִּתִךְ‎</span> consecutive [[Nah.1.12|Nah 1:12]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעַנֶּה‎</span> [[Job.37.23|Job 37:23]], etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַנּוּ‎</span> [[Judg.19.24|Judg 19:24]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַנֵּה‎</span> [[Exod.22.22|Exod 22:22]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַנּוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.58.5|Isa 58:5]] +, etc.; ***Participle*** plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעַנַּיִךְ‎</span> [[Isa.60.14|Isa 60:14]]; [[Zeph.3.19|Zeph 3:19]] — 

**1** ***humble, mishandle, afflict:*** individual [[Gen.16.6|Gen 16:6]]; [[Gen.31.50|Gen 31:50]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Exod.22.21|Exod 22:21]]; [[Exod.22.22|Exod 22:22]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Job.30.11|Job 30:11]] by imprisonment and bonds [[Judg.16.5|Judg 16:5]]; [[Judg.16.6|Judg 16:6]]; [[Judg.16.19|Judg 16:19]]; [[Ps.105.18|Ps 105:18]] a nation by war or in bondage [[Gen.15.13|Gen 15:13]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Exod.1.11|Exod 1:11]]; [[Exod.1.12|Exod 1:12]]; [[Num.24.24|Num 24:24]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Deut.26.6|Deut 26:6]]; [[1Sam.12.8|1Sam 12:8]] (inserting <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְעַנּוּם מִצְרַיִם‎</span>, so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] [compare [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]]]), [[2Sam.7.10|2Sam 7:10]]; [[2Kgs.17.20|2Kgs 17:20]]; [[Ps.94.5|Ps 94:5]]; [[Isa.60.14|Isa 60:14]]; [[Zeph.3.19|Zeph 3:19]] dynasty of David [[Ps.89.23|Ps 89:23]]. 

**2.** ***humble***, a woman by cohabitation, [[Gen.34.2|Gen 34:2]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Deut.21.14|Deut 21:14]]; [[Deut.22.24|Deut 22:24]]; [[Deut.22.29|Deut 22:29]]; [[Judg.19.24|Judg 19:24]]; [[Judg.20.5|Judg 20:5]]; [[2Sam.13.12|2Sam 13:12]]; [[2Sam.13.14|2Sam 13:14]]; [[2Sam.13.22|2Sam 13:22]]; [[2Sam.13.32|2Sam 13:32]]; [[Ezek.22.10|Ezek 22:10]]; [[Ezek.22.11|Ezek 22:11]]; [[Lam.5.11|Lam 5:11]]. 

**3.** ***afflict*** as a discipline (God agent) [[Deut.8.2|Deut 8:2]]; [[Deut.8.3|Deut 8:3]]; [[Deut.8.16|Deut 8:16]]; [[1Kgs.11.39|1Kgs 11:39]]; [[Ps.88.8|Ps 88:8]]; [[Ps.90.15|Ps 90:15]]; [[Ps.119.75|Ps 119:75]]; [[Isa.64.11|Isa 64:11]]; [[Nah.1.12|Nah 1:12]] (twice in verse); [[Lam.3.33|Lam 3:33]]. 

**4.** ***humble, weaken***, object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּחַ‎</span> [[Ps.102.24|Ps 102:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משׁפט‎</span> [[Job.37.23|Job 37:23]] (compare Talmud <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִנָּה דִּין‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶפֶשׁ‎</span> ***oneself***, by fasting [[Lev.16.29|Lev 16:29]]; [[Lev.16.31|Lev 16:31]]; [[Lev.23.27|Lev 23:27]]; [[Lev.23.32|Lev 23:32]]; [[Num.29.7|Num 29:7]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Ps.35.13|Ps 35:13]]; [[Isa.58.3|Isa 58:3]]; [[Isa.58.5|Isa 58:5]] by an oath [[Num.30.14|Num 30:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֻנֵּיתִי‎</span> [[Ps.119.71|Ps 119:71]] ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּעֻנֶּה‎</span> [[Lev.23.29|Lev 23:29]] ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֻנּוֺתוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.132.1|Ps 132:1]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְעֻנֶּה‎</span> [[Isa.53.4|Isa 53:4]] — 

**1.** ***be afflicted***, in discipline by God [[Ps.119.71|Ps 119:71]]; [[Ps.132.1|Ps 132:1]]; [[Isa.53.4|Isa 53:4]]. 

**2.** ***be humbled*** by fasting [[Lev.23.29|Lev 23:29]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּעֲנֵם‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.35|1Kgs 8:35]] = [[2Chr.6.26|2Chr 6:26]] ***afflict***, in discipline. **Hithpa\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעַנָּה‎</span> [[1Kgs.2.26|1Kgs 2:26]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִתְעַנִּיתָ‎</span> v[[1Kgs.2.26|1Kgs 2:26]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְעַנּוּ‎</span> [[Ps.107.17|Ps 107:17]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעַנִּי‎</span> [[Gen.16.9|Gen 16:9]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעַנּוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.8.21|Ezek 8:21]]; [[Dan.10.12|Dan 10:12]] — 

**1.** ***humble oneself*** (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת יָדֶיהָ‎</span>) [[Gen.16.9|Gen 16:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]). 

**2.** ***be afflicted***, by men [[1Kgs.2.26|1Kgs 2:26]] (twice in verse); by God in discipline [[Ps.107.17|Ps 107:17]]. 

**3.** ***humble oneself*** in fasting [[Ezra.8.21|Ezra 8:21]]; [[Dan.10.12|Dan 10:12]].
